dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, where magic and mystery await.

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a legendary sword hidden deep within the forest. I aim to find it.

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: Be careful, Eira. The forest is full of dark creatures and ancient magic. We don't know what we're up against.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As they venture deeper into the forest, the trees grow taller and the shadows grow darker. Suddenly, a figure steps out from behind a tree...

dialogues.speaker: Lyra
dialogues.text: Ah-ah, travelers. I see you're seeking the legendary sword. But first, you must prove your worth to me.
